Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Park Grand London Paddington, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Whiteleys Shopping Centre and Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star guesthouse is close to Imperial College London and Selfridges.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 157 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Victorian guesthouse also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the guesthouse's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the guesthouse's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Victorian guesthouse also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 157 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at The Park Grand London Paddington, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Whiteleys Shopping Centre and Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star guesthouse is close to Imperial College London and Selfridges.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kensington Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hyde Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Albert Memorial - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Marble Arch - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Kensington Roof Gardens - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Electric Cinema - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Imperial College London - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Portobello Road Market - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Portman Square - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Selfridges - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 16 km / 9.9 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.2 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for The Park Grand London Paddington is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
